Lv2_Area_2_NPC_1: ^In that tavern I left my weapons, if you can open the door you can take them!
^OH THANK YOU, BUT HOW DO I OPEN THE DOOR?
Thanks: ^Take a good look around, that tool there can be useful for you, interact with it and try to rotate it in various ways
Hands: ^Very brave, but I think with your hands you can do very little
^TAKE IT EASY, I CAN DO IT
